name: [Demo] The Light at the End of the Ocean
name_original: [Demo] The Light at the End of the Ocean
description:
Demo only. Full release coming soon!

A young woman wakes up in a lighthouse with a head injury and no memory of the shipwreck that brought her there—or anything else, for that matter. A stone-faced, stoic Lighthouse Keeper assures her that help will arrive soon, but seems unwilling or unable to help her figure out whom or where she is. Help the Lighthouse Keeper’s Guest uncover the mysteries of the island and its inhabitants in this point-and-click visual novel about unlikely friendship and loss of identity.

This demo is approximately 15 minutes long. You might want to play it twice, since there are two different scenes you can unlock with your choices during the point-and-click segment!

The Light at the End of the Ocean deals with themes of mental illness. The demo only briefly touches on those themes, but the full version will address them in a bit more detail, and I'll add corresponding content warnings once it's released.

Full credits and more information on the game's website.
